text: FIFA Football 2002 is a 2001 association football simulation video game in Electronic Arts' FIFA series created by EA Canada and published by Electronic Arts. It was released for the Playstation, Playstation 2, GameCube and Microsoft Windows. title: FIFA Football 2002
